fields.name: DeWalt DCD776D2T-GB 18V 2 x 2.0Ah Li-Ion XR Cordless Combi Drill
fields.description: Compact drill driver with XR Li-ion battery technology, designed for speed and efficiency. Ergonomic design and rubber grip increase comfort and offer maximum control. Supplied a TSTAK kit box with multi-voltage charger for all XR Li-ion slide pack batteries.
fields.additional_attributes:
2 x 2.0Ah Li-Ion Batteries
90min Charge Time
Max. Torque: 42Nm
15 Torque Settings + Drill + Hammer Drill
13mm Keyless Chuck
2-Speed & Reverse
All-Metal Gearing
Electronic Brake
LED Work Light
Spindle Lock

fields.name: DeWalt Barstow Holster Work Trousers
fields.description: Lightweight pro-stretch, rip-stop work trousers with holster pockets. Features integrated padded mobile phone pocket. 200g/m².

2 x Upper Front, 2 x Holster, 1 x Cargo Side, 1 x Ruler, 2 x Knee Pad, 1 x Mobile Phone & 2 x Back Pocket(s)
Cordura-Reinforced Knee Pad Pockets
Slim Fit
Breathable Fabric
Without Hammer Strap
Zip Fly

fields.name: Strike Fibreglass Claw Hammer 20oz (0.57kg)
fields.description: Textured, bi-material grip fibreglass handle absorbs shock and reduces vibration. Heat-treated and rim-tempered high-carbon steel head. Ideal for everyday use on light to medium-duty nailing applications.
fields.additional_attributes:
Heat-Treated Carbon Steel Head
Fibreglass Ergonomic Handle
33mm Smooth Face
Shock-Absorbent Handle
Overstrike Protection for Added Durability
Curved Claw for Easy Nail Removal

fields.name: Irwin Jack 8tpi Wood Saw 20" (500mm)
fields.description: Razor-sharp triple-ground teeth for cutting all materials. Cuts on the push and pull. Water-based lacquer gives up to 4 times more rust protection. Comfortable handle for prolonged use.
fields.additional_attributes:
Cuts Wood
Triple-Ground Teeth
Ripping & Cross Cut
0.85mm Steel Blade
Plastic Soft-Grip Handle

fields.name: Stanley FatMax Retractable Folding Knife
fields.description: Folding retractable utility knife designed for safety and convenient storage. Ergonomically designed for comfort and with heavy duty construction for longer working life.
fields.additional_attributes:
* Blade
* 3 Blades Supplied
* Integrated Spare Blade Storage
* Ergonomic Handle

fields.name: Storm Waterproof Jacket

fields.name: Makita DTM51Z LXT Multi-Tool - Bare
fields.description: Multi-tool with tool-less blade change. Lever-style accessory clamp allows quick accessory replacement at 12 different angles over 360°. With variable speed control and anti-restart feature for added safety. Includes battery capacity lamp, showing when battery has been used and when battery power is nearly depleted.
fields.additional_attributes:
6-Speed
Quick-Release Blade Change
All-Metal Gearbox
Slide On/Off Switch
Without Work Light
Rubber-Coated Grip
Replaceable Carbon Brushes
Oscillation Angle 3.2°
Soft Start
Does Not Include Battery or Charger

fields.name: Goldscrew PZ Double-Countersunk Self-Tapping Multipurpose Screws 5mm x 50mm 200 Pack
fields.description: Top quality, waxed single thread, multipurpose screw. Popular with the professional. Features a lower screw-in torque and faster drive speed. Suitable for screwdrivers, combi drills and impact drivers.
fields.additional_attributes:
Double-Countersunk Head for Reduced Shear
Deep, Sharp, Single Thread for Cutting Cleanly through Wood
Zinc-Plated & Yellow-Passivated
Carbon Steel Construction
Wax-Coated
Fully Threaded
For Wood, Plastic, Masonry & 1mm Sheet Metal
Heat-Treated for Snap Resistance
Corrosion-Resistant

fields.name: Site Kirksey Stretch Holster Trousers Grey/Black
fields.description: Stretch holster trousers feature triple stitching for durability in tough working conditions. Multiple pockets include top-loading knee pad inserts and easy-access holster pockets.

fields.name: DeWalt Reynolds Stone Waterproof Steel Toe Cap Safety Boots
fields.description: Stone leather nubuck. Waterproof and breathable membrane. Steel toe cap and steel midsole protection. Padded collar and tongue for added comfort. PU/Rubber injection outsole and PU comfort insole. Wide fit.

fields.name: Site Fortress Black Waterproof Steel Toe Cap Safety Boots
fields.description: Tough and hardwearing safety boots with moulded rubber scuff cap and PU footbed. Water-resistant nubuck leather upper. Padded tongue and collar.

fields.name: CAT Holton Honey Steel Toe Cap Safety Boots
fields.description: 100% leather upper with ankle support. Protect the feet and provide all-day comfort. With Techni-Flex sole, 4 lacing eyelets, and padded collar and tongue. Ideal for any working environment.

fields.name: Easyfix General Purpose Threaded Coach Bolts Carbon Steel Bright Zinc-Plated M10 x 130mm 50 Pack
fields.description: BZP. Mushroom head. Fully threaded. Nuts supplied.

fields.name: Blaklader Stretch Denim Trousers
